title: Did you use any of Type Together's fonts lately? Then get Adelle Bold absolutely free!!
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103140356/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 27.Jul.2009 12.48pm 

Thatâ€™s right, we have a treat for our customers. We are giving away full commercial licences of Adelle Bold absolutely free. All you need to do is sending us samples of your work where our typefaces are used. In addition to getting Adelle Bold in return, we will handpick and publish some of the projects in our Type In Use section, crediting the designer and linking to his or her website.

Click here to read the instructions for submitting your work. ( [http://www.type-together.com/index.php?action=portal/viewContent&cntId\_c...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103140356/http:/www.type-together.com/index.php?action=portal/viewContent&cntId_content=2795&id_section=146 "http://www.type-together.com/index.php?action=portal/viewContent&cntId\_content=2795&id\_section=146"))

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103140356im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TIU_Promo2_3429.gif)
author: Miss Tiffany
